G

Game - Class in Collecto
This class contains the implementation of a game of Collecto.
Game(GridBoard, String, String) - Constructor for class Collecto.Game
Constructs a new Game object with a given GridBoard, and the names of the 2 players of this game.
Game(String, String) - Constructor for class Collecto.Game
Constructs a new Game object and a new GridBoard given the names of the 2 players of this game.
gameEnded(PlayerHandler) - Method in class Collecto.Server
Ends game for provided player by removing this player from inGame array.
getBallAmount() - Method in class Collecto.Player
Returns the total amount of balls that this player currently has.
getBalls() - Method in class Collecto.Player
Returns a HashMap of the different colour balls this player has obtained and the corresponding amount of that colour ball that this player has acquired.
getBalls(int) - Method in class Collecto.Game
Fetches the balls that a player has acquired this game in a HashMap where each Ball colour maps to an integer value containing the amount that the player holds of that ball colour.
getBoard() - Method in class Collecto.Game
Returns the board of this game in its current state.
getBoardString() - Method in class Collecto.Game
Returns the current state of the board as a String.
getBoardString() - Method in class Collecto.GridBoard
Returns string representation of the board according to the project protocol.
getDirection() - Method in class Collecto.Move
Returns the direction of this move.
getField(int, int) - Method in class Collecto.GridBoard
Retrieves a ball on a specified field.
getLevel() - Method in class Collecto.ComputerPlayer
Returns the difficulty level of this ComputerPlayer.
getLine() - Method in class Collecto.Move
Returns the line of this move.
getName() - Method in class Collecto.Player
Returns the name of this player.
getName() - Method in class Collecto.PlayerHandler
Returns the name of the player (client) connected to this Player.
getPlayerName(int) - Method in class Collecto.Game
Fetches the name of the player given by the index.
getPlayers() - Method in class Collecto.Server
Returns names of all players currently being on server.
getPoints() - Method in class Collecto.Player
Returns calculated total point for this Player, where 3 points are awarded for every 3 balls of the same colour that this Player has acquired.
getScore(int) - Method in class Collecto.Game
Calculates the score of the player, where 1 point is awarded for every 3 balls of the same colour that the player has collected.
getWinner() - Method in class Collecto.Game
Determines which player would be the winner of the game in the current state, based on the players points.
Global - Class in Collecto
This class contains methods, classes and a delimiter, which are used by multiple other methods.
Global() - Constructor for class Collecto.Global
 
green(String) - Static method in class Collecto.Colour
Turns the given string into a green string and resets the colour at the end of the string.
GREEN - Collecto.Ball
 
GREEN - Static variable in class Collecto.Colour
 
grey(String) - Static method in class Collecto.Colour
Turns the given string into a grey string and resets the colour at the end of the string.
GREY - Static variable in class Collecto.Colour
 
GridBoard - Class in Collecto
This class contains the actual game board and handles all operations made on its attributes.
GridBoard() - Constructor for class Collecto.GridBoard
Calls GridBoard(boolean) with true boolean passed which constructs the GridBoard with a randomised board.
GridBoard(ArrayList<ArrayList<Ball>>) - Constructor for class Collecto.GridBoard
Constructs a new GridBoard where the board attribute is set to be a provided custom board.
